storyInfo: When Ash arrives at the Long Spring mines as planned, everything slowly becomes clear. Levi, the mad scientist, has also arrived in this world, and is teaming up with the Lord's son to further his crazed machinations.

attributes.content: Rangers's map stops here.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: It's all up to us now.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Who knew this cave would be so big?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: It's like the ground beneath the town is completely hollow.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Are the explosives okay?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We've got the strongest batch from the safehouse here.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I hope Lord's plan works.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I'm afraid it won't be that simple. Look there...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: ...I hope it's not what I think it is...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Gaa...
attributes.name: Originiutant Infected

attributes.content: That's... a person?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Gaa...
attributes.name: Originiutant Infected

attributes.content: Whatever it is, it's going to die and that's enough.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I won't be surprised at whatever *profanity* showing up now...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Keep moving! Don't get caught up in a fight with them. We don't have time to waste in here!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: ...Why would Long Spring have a facility like this underneath it?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Cohen... Where are we?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I knew it! *profanity*, I knew it!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: So this is where most of the lab ended up.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, we were too careless.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We've lived in this town for so long and we had no idea at all.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: It's that psycho behind all this.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What's that smell...?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What else could it be? That's the smell of death.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Stay frosty. And close.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What are these?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Cages? So many?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: All corpses... people and beasts together...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: This is the work of Lev Klitschko, a man both mad and cruel beyond imagination. I never should've tried to take him alive. He should have a bullet in his head.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Your typical madman wouldn't do something this awful.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: ...There's someone alive in that cage.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Look who's here?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: It's that Drudge character.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'd recognize the *profanity* anywhere.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Oh, it's you. The mercenaries.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I'm so glad to see you.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I know we've had our differences in the past... but let's set them aside for now.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I have a feeling you're looking for that scientist... and I know where he is.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: We've got a common enemy. And the enemy of my enemy is my friend.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: So brazen I'm sick to my stomach.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: That Feline over there, I know you.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Your skills are pretty easily recognizable. And one can hear a lot in the mercenary market in Columbia.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You are a killer, aren't you?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Rhodes Island hired you, meaning even they have quite some dirty work to do.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Compared to others, you must know better how to weigh up the pros and cons. Let's have a talk, shall we?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Shut up. Or I can help you with that.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Shame. I thought people like you would be more realistic.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Open the cage.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Just open the cage.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Good call. We all know the score.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Yeah. I sure do.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Hold on, what are you doing?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Agh!!!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Hey! You crazy...
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Help me......please......
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Please...
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Please... stop.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Hah. You can still talk. Guess I'm not done.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: And this one's for Dr. Miarow.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Okay, okay, he's had enough.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You went a little overboard there.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What... you feel bad for him?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Man, you almost killed him.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Totally rearranged his face.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Save your strength. We've still got work to do.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Nothing. I'm just feeling a lot more relaxed.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You know what? Me too.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: If he's locked up in here, he must be part of Lev's plan.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'm not surprised.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I don't see anyone here...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Might be an ambush ahead. Keep cautious.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Well well well, look who it is. More visitors to my laboratory?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: It's been a while, my friends from Team Rainbow.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.text: A gigantic experimental area, a corner previously kept dark, is bathed in light. At the same time, the visitors all realize why they didn't notice the air when they came in.
The elderly scholar stands behind a thick glass wall, and in front of a huge cultivator. Lev has a grotesque smile on his face, both chilling and unnatural.
A moment later, the cultivator itself lights up, and reveals a spherical crystal wrapped in connective tissue floating, writhing, twitching.

attributes.content: You're just in time.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: No... you always come at precisely the right time.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Don't bother. It's bulletproof glass.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I applaud your decisiveness, squeezing the trigger without hesitation. Don't even wait for an end to our little prologue here.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: But we have a show to put on. A great opening requires a great audience, and a complete opening dialogue.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Today is a day of praise for the great work of the Creator. And that Creator is none other than yours truly.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Creator? That's quite a title you've given yourself.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You're a *profanity* psycho!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Psycho... hah. The mediocre always use this word to describe ideas and concepts they cannot understand.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Behold this world!
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Completely different chemistry... totally inverted laws of physics... the flower of science blooms in exploration and doubt. And the most fertile soil lies in the land of the unknown!
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: And now, I have succeeded.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Do you see? Can you feel? The surface appearance is similar, but it all functions on radically different principles!
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: This is the evolution of life. This is the iteration of existence.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Originium is the truth of this world. You should accept that. Don't fear it.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Welcome to the future.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Don't you have even the slightest moral compunction over what you're doing?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What does human life even mean to you?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Human nature is weak, good and evil are subjective definitions of weakness, and what we call guilt is but one of the myriad cognitive signals produced by the brain.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: And the science I pursue is never swayed by such flimsy concepts.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Don't delude yourselves that even in this world you still bind your minds with these meaningless ideas.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Even electronic information technology and nuclear energy were originally designed to help us kill each other more effectively.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Would you add a new layer of definition to science? Force everything to fit your fragile spiritual needs?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Nonsense.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: But I forgive you.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You don't have to understand. I'll allow you to go on, unknowing. Primitive thinking is a common form of ignorance. It's not your fault, and I forgive you.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: That's the end of my speech. And in addition to my forgiveness, I also offer you my thanks for waiting so patiently.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Now it is time for praise. Give your praise to this entirely new life form.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Praise be! Praise be! Praise be!!!
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.text: Blood splatters everywhere. Glossy, inorganic compounds break through the cultivator. Writhing, deformed limbs support a massive, unwieldy, spherical head at an uncanny angle. And sharp, reddish spines pierce straight through the scientist's skull. It presses, reforms, and fuses together.

attributes.content: No matter what, we absolutely can't let that thing make it to the surface.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You stall it! I'll get the bomb ready!
attributes.name: Blitz
